forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Low 49F. SW winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
